ygData.subject: Re: Ultravision on Dark Elves
ygData.msgSnippet: do not even try invis. Dark elves wont see you, but some dark elf PCs are known for casting see invis on guards. Also invis is very unreliable. you should wait
ygData.messageBody:
do not even try invis. Dark elves wont see you, but some dark elf PCs are
known for casting see invis on guards.
Also invis is very unreliable. you should wait for Illusion: Dark elf at
level 12. that's reliable. also, if you dont know Neriak, you might want to
create a dark elf character first and visit it. it's really really hard to
learn ( worse than Freeport or Qeynos ).
Skara.

-----Original Message-----
From: HiFi Review [mailto:hifireview@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 12:51 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Ultravision on Dark Elves


From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>

Does ultravision allow them to see invisible as well? Can you sneak
into Neriak with invis on or is that not sufficient?

Q d'E
